pages.cookies: Cookies Policy | Protection of your personal data Home About HOW TO PLAY FAQ'S DOWNLOAD APP Welcome to the Culinary World of Evolution cricket At Evolution Cricket, we use cookies to enhance your experience while using our website and mobile application. Cookies are small files stored on your device that track, save, and store information about your interactions and usage patterns. Below, we outline how we use cookies and how you can manage them: Essential Cookies: These cookies are necessary for the functionality of our website and app. They enable basic functions like page navigation, account login, and access to secure areas. You cannot opt out of these cookies as they are essential for the site to function properly. Performance and Analytics Cookies: We use these cookies to collect information about how visitors use our website and app. This helps us analyze and improve the performance of our services. For example, we may track which pages are visited most frequently or identify any errors that occur. Functionality Cookies These cookies enhance the usability of our website and app by remembering your preferences (such as language or region selection) and providing personalized features. They may also be used to provide services you have requested, such as live chat support. Advertising and Targeting Cookies: We and our advertising partners may use these cookies to deliver advertisements that are relevant to your interests. They may also limit the number of times you see an ad and measure the effectiveness of advertising campaigns. Managing Cookies You can control and/or delete cookies as you wish. Most web browsers automatically accept cookies, but you can usually modify your browser settings to decline cookies if you prefer. This may prevent you from taking full advantage of our website and app. Varieties of Cookies on Our Platter: Our kitchen boasts an array of cookies, from fleeting session treats to enduring persistent delights. We source our cookies from trusted providers, ensuring each morsel enhances your journey with us. Crafting Your Culinary Experience: You hold the chef's spoon in your hands, with the power to accept or decline our delectable offerings. However, be mindful that altering your settings may alter the flavor profile of your digital feast. Evolving Our Culinary Artistry: Just as culinary trends evolve, so do our recipes. We're committed to continually refining our Cookies Policy, ensuring it remains as fresh and enticing as the dishes we serve. Bon appétit! For any inquiries or cravings regarding our cookie creations, please contact us at evolutioncricket@gmail.com. Thank you for joining us on this culinary adventure at Evolution cricket! PRIVACY POLICY TERMS & CONDITIONS COOKIES POLICY evolutioncricket@gmail.com PAYMENT PARTNERS Disclaimer Evolution Cricket is a fantasy sports application designed for entertainment purposes only. While we strive to provide accurate and up-to-date information, the outcomes in the game are based on real-world events and the performances of actual players, which are subject to change. Users should be aware that any financial transactions, such as in-app purchases or entry fees for competitions, are made at their own risk. Evolution Cricket is not responsible for any financial loss or emotional distress resulting from participation in the app. Always play responsibly and ensure you are complying with local regulations regarding fantasy sports and online gaming. 18+

Dive into the world of cricket with Evolution Cricket! Become the manager of your own fantasy team, compete with friends and players worldwide, follow real matches, and rack up points to dominate the leaderboard. Start your cricket journey now! GET APP LINK Over 1.6 Million Registered Users 100% Secure and Safe Round-the-Clock Support Minimal Platform Fees About At Evolution Cricket, we believe in more than just the game. We believe in the thrill of strategic thinking, the excitement of competition, and the joy of camaraderie. Our mission is to bring the world of fantasy cricket to life in a way that’s never been done before. Born from a passion for cricket and a love for innovation, Evolution Cricket combines cutting-edge technology with the timeless spirit of the sport. Our team is a dynamic mix of cricket enthusiasts, tech geeks, and creative visionaries, all dedicated to crafting an immersive, engaging, and unparalleled fantasy cricket experience. We’re not just creating a game; we’re building a community. A place where fans from all corners of the globe can come together to share their passion, showcase their skills, and revel in the ultimate cricket showdown. With Evolution Cricket, you don’t just watch the game – you live it. Join us on this exhilarating journey and transform the way you experience cricket. Whether you're a seasoned cricket aficionado or a curious newcomer, Evolution Cricket is your gateway to the extraordinary world of fantasy sports. Let’s play, compete, and evolve together! Get app link WHY Evolution Cricket MOST POPULAR? Collaborations with Professional Players: Evolution Cricket offers a one-of-a-kind fantasy cricket experience that combines the excitement of real matches with the strategic depth of fantasy gaming. Our platform allows fans to immerse themselves in the game and engage in ways they never thought possible. Extensive Selection: Evolution Cricket offers an extensive assortment of players, teams, and leagues from around the world. Whether you're into international tournaments or local leagues, we have it all covered. User-Friendly Interface: Our app is designed with you in mind. With an intuitive interface and seamless navigation, even first-time users will find it easy to create their dream team, follow live matches, and track their progress. Cutting-Edge Technology: We use the latest technology to ensure that our platform is fast, reliable, and engaging. Real-time updates, advanced analytics, and immersive graphics make Evolution Cricket a standout choice. Community and Competitions: Join a vibrant community of cricket enthusiasts. Participate in daily and weekly competitions, challenge your friends, and see how you stack up against players worldwide. Rewarding Experience: Our rewards system is designed to keep you motivated and engaged. Earn points, badges, and exclusive rewards as you play, manage your team, and climb the leaderboards. Insightful Analytics: Make informed decisions with our in-depth player statistics and match analytics. Our detailed data helps you strategize better and increase your chances of winning. Innovative Features: We’re constantly evolving and adding new features to enhance your gaming experience. From unique game modes to special events, there’s always something new to look forward to in Evolution Cricket. Get a Sneak Peek of the Evolution Cricket App Access the Evolution cricket App Now! Join the ultimate cricket experience with Evolution Cricket! Manage your fantasy team, compete with friends and global players, and enjoy real-time match updates. With professional player collaborations, a user-friendly interface, extensive player selection, and cutting-edge technology, our app brings you closer to the game than ever before. Unlock rewards, analyze detailed stats, and stay engaged with innovative features. Download now and start your cricket journey today! Visit windaily.co and select the "Download for Android" option. Once the apk has finished downloading, simply tap on "Open". Ensure that installation from unknown sources is enabled in your device's settings. A Guide to Playing Evolution Cricket: 4 Unique and Exciting Steps Step 1: Create Your Dream Team Join Evolution Cricket and create your own dream team! Step 2: Strategize and Optimize Once your team is set, it's time to craft your winning strategy. Study match schedules, player form, and opposition weaknesses. Use the app’s advanced analytics to predict player performance and make tactical adjustments. Substitute players, alter batting orders, and tweak bowling lineups to maximize your team’s potential. The more you adapt to real-time conditions and match scenarios, the better your chances of dominating the leaderboards. Step 3: Engage in Live Matches Feel the adrenaline rush as you follow live matches and see your strategies come to life. The app provides real-time updates, detailed scorecards, and player performances. Engage with interactive features like live chats and polls to share your thoughts and predictions with other cricket enthusiasts. Earn points based on your players' real-world performances and watch as your team climbs the rankings. Step 4: Earn Rewards and Evolve Your journey doesn't end with just playing matches. Participate in daily challenges, special tournaments, and exclusive events to earn points, badges, and unique rewards. Use your earnings to unlock new features, access premium content, and improve your team. Stay active in the Evolution Cricket community to gain insights, exchange tips, and evolve as a top manager. The more you play, the more you grow, and the closer you get to becoming a fantasy cricket legend. FAQ'S Can I create custom tournaments with my own rules? Absolutely! Evolution Cricket allows you to create custom tournaments where you can set your own rules, select specific teams, and invite friends to compete. This feature gives you complete control over your fantasy cricket experience, making each tournament unique and tailored to your preferences. What happens if a player in my team gets injured mid-tournament? Injuries are part of the game, but we've got you covered. If a player in your team gets injured, you can use our "Injury Replacement" feature to substitute the player without any penalty. This ensures that your team remains competitive and you don’t lose points due to unforeseen circumstances. Is there a way to mentor new players within the app? Yes, we have a mentorship program within Evolution Cricket! Experienced players can sign up to become mentors and guide new users through the intricacies of fantasy cricket. This feature fosters a supportive community and allows seasoned managers to share their expertise and strategies. How does Evolution Cricket handle unexpected match cancellations? In the event of a match cancellation, we have a robust contingency plan. Points for the cancelled match will be adjusted based on pre-defined criteria, and you'll receive notifications with detailed explanations. We ensure that cancellations have minimal impact on your overall tournament experience. Can I track my team’s performance over multiple seasons? Definitely! Our "Season Tracker" feature allows you to track your team’s performance across different seasons. You can view detailed statistics, performance trends, and historical data to analyze your strategies and improve your game over time. It’s a great way to see how far you’ve come and set new goals. What unique rewards can I earn apart from points and badges? Evolution Cricket offers a variety of unique rewards beyond traditional points and badges. You can earn exclusive experiences such as virtual meet-and-greets with professional players, personalized cricket gear, and VIP tickets to real-world matches. These rewards add an extra layer of excitement and motivation to your fantasy cricket journey. What Our Players Say I’ve tried several fantasy cricket apps, but Evolution Cricket takes the cake! The collaboration with professional players provides unparalleled insights that really help in making informed decisions. The app is super easy to use, and the custom tournament feature is a game-changer. I’ve never had so much fun managing my fantasy team! Review by CricketLover92 Evolution Cricket is incredible! The real-time updates and live match engagement make me feel like I’m right there on the field. I love the community aspect, where I can chat with other cricket enthusiasts and even mentor new players. Plus, the rewards are fantastic – I’m aiming for those VIP match tickets! Review by SportsFanatic89 This app has transformed how I watch and enjoy cricket. The extensive player selection and detailed analytics help me build a powerful team every time. I appreciate the thoughtful features like injury replacements and season tracking. Evolution Cricket isn’t just a game; it’s an immersive cricket experience that keeps getting better! Review by FantasyGuru101 Get the Evolution cricket App Now! pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy | Protection of your personal data Home About HOW TO PLAY FAQ'S DOWNLOAD APP Privacy Policy for Evolution cricket 1. PRIVACY Сommitted to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy lets you know what information we collect when you use our services, why we collect this information and how we use the collected information. Please note that this Privacy Policy will be agreed between you and YOUR WEBSITE. (‘We’, ‘Us’ or ‘Our’, as appropriate). This Privacy Policy is an integrated part of YOUR WEBSITE’s Terms and Conditions. The website Diamond River ("Casino", "Website", “Company”, "We", "Us", "Our") is owned and operated by Evolution cricket. We may periodically make changes to this Privacy Policy and will notify you of these changes by posting the modified terms on our platforms. We recommend that you revisit this Privacy Policy regularly. 2. INFORMATION COLLECTED We consider information that may be used to identify an individual, including, but not limited to, first and last name, date of birth, home or other physical address, email address, phone number or other relevant information to be Personal Information (‘Personal Information’). You may be asked to provide Personal Information when you use our website, register for an account or use our services. The Personal Information that we collect may include information such as: contact information (including telephone number), shipping information, billing information, transaction history, website usage preferences, and feedback regarding the Services. This information is held by us on servers based in Germany and elsewhere from time to time. When you interact with the services, our servers keep an activity log unique to you that collects certain administrative and traffic information including: source IP address, time of access, date of access, web page(s) visited, language use, software crash reports and type of browser used. This information is essential for the provision and quality of our services. We do not collect Personal Information about you without your knowledge. 3. MEANS OF COLLECTING AND PROCESSING DATA We may automatically collect certain data as discussed above and receive Personal Information about you where you provide such information through the services or other communications and interactions on the YOUR WEBSITE site. We may also receive Personal Information from online vendors and service providers, and from customer lists lawfully acquired from third-party vendors. In addition, we may engage the services of third-party service providers to provide technical support process your online transactions and maintain your account. We will have access to any information you provide to such vendors, service providers and third-party e-commerce services, and we will use the Personal Information as set out in this Privacy Policy below. This information will only be disclosed to third parties outside the company in accordance with this Privacy Policy. We take steps to ensure that our arrangements with third-party service providers and online vendors protect your privacy. 4. INFORMATION USE We use the Personal Information we collect from you to deliver our Services, to provide customer support, to undertake necessary security and identify verification checks, to process any of your online transactions, to assist your participation in third-party promotions, meet certain business requirements and for any other purpose related to the operation of the Services. As such, we may share your Personal Information with our carefully selected partners (including any other parties that have data sharing arrangements with the latter). Your Personal Information may also be used by us to provide you with: (1) promotional offers and information regarding our products and services; and (2) promotional offers and information regarding the products and services of our partners, in order to enlarge the range of provided products and improve our customer service. From time-to-time, we may request information from you via surveys or contests. Participation in these surveys or contests is completely voluntary and you have the choice of whether or not to disclose such information. Information requested may include contact information (such as name, correspondence address and telephone number), and demographic information (such as zip or postal code or age). By accepting any contest prize or winnings from us, you consent to use of your name for advertising and promotional purposes without additional compensation, except where prohibited by law. Unless you have elected not to receive promotional information, we may also use your Personal Information (including your email address and phone number) to provide you with information regarding our products, services and promotions, including other gaming products (including online poker, casino, betting, backgammon) and products and services from third parties carefully selected by us. 5. CERTAIN EXCLUDED DISCLOSURES We may disclose your Personal Information if required to do so by law, or if we believe in good faith that such action is necessary to: (1) comply with any legal process served on us, any of our sites or the services or in circumstances where we are under a substantially similar legal obligation; (2) protect and defend our rights or property; or (3) act to protect the personal safety of users of the services or the public. If, in our sole determination, you are found to have cheated or attempted to defraud us, the company , or any other user of the services in any way including but not limited to game manipulation or payment fraud, or if we suspect you of fraudulent payment, including use of stolen credit cards, or any other fraudulent activity (including any chargeback or other reversal of a payment) or prohibited transaction (including money laundering), we reserve the right to share this information (together with your identity) with other online gaming sites, banks, credit card companies, appropriate agencies and relevant authorities. (4) For the purpose of research on the prevention of addiction, data can be made anonymous and passed on to the respective institutions. 6. ACCESS You may ‘opt out’ of receiving any promotional communications either by choosing to opt out via your account settings available on our sites or the services or in an email you receive from us, or at any time by sending an email, or by writing to us at Customer Service. In addition, You may contact us if you: 1) want to confirm the accuracy of the Personal Information we have collected about you; 2) would like to update your Personal Information; and/or 3) have any complaint regarding our use of your Personal Information. If requested, we will (1) update any information you have provided to us, in case you prove the necessity for such changes or (2) mark any information to prohibit future use for marketing purposes. For the avoidance of doubt, nothing in this Privacy Policy shall prevent us from retaining your Personal Information where we are required to do so by law. 7. COOKIES Information placed on your device When accessing our services, we may store information on your device. This information is referred to as cookies, which are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit online pages that record your preferences. We also use Local Shared Objects or ‘flash cookies’. ‘Flash cookies’ are similar to browser cookies. They allow us to remember things about your visits across our sites. Neither cookies nor flash cookies can be used to access or use other information on your computer. We only use these methods to track your use of our services. Cookies help us monitor traffic to the site, improve our services and make it easier and/or more relevant for your use. We use flash cookies and third party cookies to help us show you more relevant and desirable advertisements. Strictly necessary cookies Strictly necessary cookies are essential to allow a user move around a website and use its features, such as accessing secure areas of the website or making financial transactions. Without these cookies, we would not be able to make our websites work efficiently. During the registration process These cookies will hold information collected during your registration and will allow us to recognize you as a customer and provide you with the services you require. We may also use this data to better understand your interests while online and to enhance your visits to our platforms. By using the Website, you agree to comply with these terms and conditions. If you do not agree to these terms of use, please refrain from using the Website. Evolution Cricket is the flagship brand of Fanmade11 Fantasy Sports Private Limited (“Evolution Cricket”). Any use of the Website establishes the User’s assent to such Terms and Conditions, rules, regulations and terms of use referred to herein or provided by Evolution Cricket in relation to any Amusement Facility, as may be amended from time to time. Notification of any change or amendment in these Terms and Conditions, rules, regulations and terms of use referred to herein or provided by Evolution Cricket, may be notified by Evolution Cricket, by either posting notifications on the Users accounts or via email to their registered email address with Evolution Cricket. It will be an obligation of the User to notify Evolution Cricket of non-acceptance of such amended Terms and Conditions, rules, regulations and terms of use referred to herein or provided by Evolution Cricket in such email or notification. Further if the same is not exercised by the User within the time as prescribed in the email or notification, it will be deemed that the User have accepted such amended Terms and Conditions, rules, regulations and terms of use referred to herein or provided by Evolution Cricket. Certain Facilities being provided on Evolution Cricket may be subject to additional rules and regulations set down in that respect. To the extent that these Terms and Conditions are inconsistent with the additional conditions set down, the additional conditions shall prevail. Breach In the event of any User’s breach or Evolution Cricket reasonably believes that such User has breached these Terms and Conditions, or has illegally or indecorously used the Website or its provided Facilities, Evolution Cricket may, restrict, suspend or cancel such User’s access to all or any part of the Website or its Facilities /Services, deactivate or delete the User’s account and all related information on the account, delete any content posted by the User’s on the Website and further, take technical and legal steps as it deems necessary at its sole and absolute discretion without any notice being provided to the User’s. If User’s fee (if any) is charged by Evolution Cricket in respect of any of its Facilities/Services, the Website shall repay such fee in the event of suspension or removal or the User’s account or the Website and its Facilities on account of any negligence on the part of Evolution Cricket. The concerned websites are subject to the privacy policy of the websites which may differ from our Privacy Policy and is beyond the scope of our Privacy Policy.
